START.name: Your Room
START.desc: You are in your tidy room. There is a PC and a Bintendo Swatch connected to the TV.

LOCATION2.name: Palette Town
LOCATION2.desc: This is a small town with three buildings, yours, your neighbors, a patchy grass field that leaves out of town and a laboratory.

LOCATION3.name: Neighbor's House
LOCATION3.desc: This is your neighbors House, You are upstairs and there is a Toke-Square on the floor. You won't take it because it isn't yours. A note says, "Meet me at the Tokeman lab! :)"

LOCATION4.name: Tokeman Lab
LOCATION4.desc: This is a Tokeman Laboratory. There is a professor standing there. He is talking to your neighbor.

LOCATION5.name: Patchy Grass
LOCATION5.desc: You are in a patchy grass leaving Palette Town

LOCATION6.name: The Wild
LOCATION6.desc: You are in a deep into the wilderness

LOCATION7.name: Outside Varidion City
LOCATION7.desc: You are right outside Varidian City

LOCATION8.name: Varidion City
LOCATION8.desc: Congratulations, you made it to Varidian City
